name: css-paint-polyfill
description: A polyfill for the CSS Paint API, with special browser optimizations.

scripts.release: npm run -s build && npm t && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.deploy: cp -rf demo build && cp -r dist build/ && sed -i '' 's/\.\.\/dist/dist/' build/index.html && gh-pages -d build && rm -rf build

author: Google Chrome Developers <chromium-dev@google.com>
